name: BeeQ
description:
Because coding literacy is important!

BeeQ: Playground of Learning

is Virtual Reality application which introduces fundamental of coding such as sequencing, looping, condition statement, etc.

Place the block commands to led a bee to reach the goal at the end of sequence of commands. Just like playing the game with the knowledge of computer science added.

Goal: The goal is to build an experiential learning environment that will engage children in coding activity. Our prototype system explores the ideas within Google’s cardboard, head-mounted display. Our approach is based on using the cheap, low cost Virtual Reality as the tool to teach kids to code.
